name: cmj1i

body.origin:
|- wbr(c0, ccm, co(c0, chj, c1))
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wcel(co(c0, chj, c1), cch)
-| wss(c0, co(c0, chj, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(c0, ccm, co(c0, chj, c1))
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wcel(co(c0, chj, c1), cch)
-| wss(c0, co(c0, chj, c1))

body.origin:
|- wcel(co(c0, chj, c1), cch)
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wcel(c1, cch)

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(c0, ccm, co(c0, chj, c1))
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wss(c0, co(c0, chj, c1))
-| wcel(c1, cch)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0[C_H](c0[vH]c1)
⊣ c0 ∈ CH
⊣ c0 ⊆(c0[vH]c1)
⊣ c1 ∈ CH

body.origin:
|- wss(c0, co(c0, chj, c1))
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wcel(c1, cch)

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(c0, ccm, co(c0, chj, c1))
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wcel(c1, cch)

comment: A Hilbert lattice element commutes with its join. (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
